column4: O.o I can't bring my screen brightness up or down, any ideas?
correction, all of my function keys are messed up
did you try with the tool on the taskbar?
are you using a laptop
yes I'm using a laptop.. and there is no tool on my taskbar, if you'd call it that
you should add the tool....right click 'Add to Panel'
I dont have a panel
=P
know the nameo f the tool?
get one...
s/nameo f/tool
thats not very helpful.. I'm not going to modify my desktop for an application
'brightness applet'
on gnome
this pertains to a larger problem than just my brightness. none of my Fn keys work
I know, I had the same kind of problem
and it pertains to brightness applet?
O.o
the brightness applet will be a temporary fix as it works better than the Fn key
I don't need a temporary fix,
but thanks =)
if you find a permanent one, tell me, I am interested
and I think you should be patient because I had that issue for a while and never found a bulletproof fix
I think some of my fn keys work though
